title: As soon as the approval is given to the Project, the no objection certificate for building permission of the land-owning authority shall be given in respect of that property to be developed under this Urban Renewal Scheme on lands belonging to any department, undertaking, agency of the State Government including MHADA, or any local self – Government such as the Municipal Corporation within 60days after the intimation of such approval to the Project is communicated
clause_text: As soon as the approval is given to the Project, the no objection certificate for building permission of the land-owning authority shall be given in respect of that property to be developed under this Urban Renewal Scheme on lands belonging to any department, undertaking, agency of the State Government including MHADA, or any local self – Government such as the Municipal Corporation within 60days after the intimation of such approval to the Project is communicated. In the event of its refusal to grant NOC, reasons thereof shall be stated and in the eventnot been given within the period, it shall be deemed to have been given.

source_pdf.text_snippet: As soon as the approval is given to the Project, the no objection certificate for building permission of the land-owning authority shall be given in respect of that property to be developed under this
